Introduction

Yugyeom (born Kim Yu-gyeom) is a South Korean singer, songwriter, and dancer. He debuted in 2014 as a member of GOT7 and later formed the duo sub-unit Jus2 with Jay B. Before his debut, he gained recognition as a competitive dancer, winning second place at the 2010 Adrenaline House Dance Battle and training under JYP Entertainment from late 2010 to early 2011.

In January 2021, Yugyeom and his GOT7 bandmates left JYP Entertainment while continuing group activities. On February 19, 2021, he signed an exclusive contract with AOMG, marking his transition into the hip-hop and R&B scene. He made his solo debut with the EP "Point of View: U" in June 2021, featuring collaborations with Gray, Loco, DeVita, Jay Park, and Punchnello. Yugyeom contributed to the album's composition, lyrics, and production, with Gray and Cha Cha Malone overseeing production.
